resources.string: Crash reports are an essential tool for developers to improve the quality and reliability of apps. They are very useful in practice to help with fixing bugs that cause crashes.

Note: The crash reports include information about app version, time when the crash happened, and stack trace so it\’s clear where in the app the crash happened. The data collected is completely anonymized.
Share crash reports with Zashi developers.
Don’t share crash reports with Zashi developers.
